title: Banh Mi
ingredients: 1 inch fresh ginger, peeled and minced
directions: Toss daikon, carrot, and cucumber in a colander with salt and sugar. Let sit.
In a large skillet, over medium-high heat, heat oil, ginger, and garlic. Add pork and brown. Add fish sauce and soy sauce. Cook until liquid is evaporated, 3-5 minutes. Remove pan from heat.
Broil split rolls until lightly toasted, 1-3 minutes.
Mix mayo and sriracha. Spread on both halves of rolls.
Squeeze excess water from veggies and divide among rolls.
Top rolls with pork and cilantro.
